notes: You'll need Councillor, Temperance, Faith, and Justice Arcana Personas for this month.

Recommended fusions: Councillor: Hua Po + Pixie = Kushi Mitama (Lv 12), Temperance: Mandrake + Pixie = Genbu (Lv 7), Faith: Kodama + Pixie = Phoenix (Lv 21), Justice: Succubus + Arsene = Angel (Lv 9).
Keep Chariot, Lovers, Hierophant, Death, Faith, Councillor, Temperance, and Justice Arcana on hand at all times.

confidantAnswers.answer: We can train at my place.

notes: Agree to hang out with Mishima. Answers do not matter.
New mementos mission acquired: Speak to the boys talking in the street by the School Gate to confirm the target name.

confidantAnswers.answer: It's a seed for new loves.

notes: This unlocks Kichijoji.
Visit Furniture Store and Sit on the Fancy Couch
Choose 'Just a little bit longer...' twice when Morgana speaks.

notes: Head to the Velvet Room and fuse Ame-no-Uzume if you don't have one (Jack Frost + Bicorn recommended).
Use the Frei card on Ame-no-Uzume to fulfill the twins' request.
Next request: Flauros with Tarukaja (Fuse Eligor + Berith + Orobas, inherit Tarukaja).
Efficient Executioner trophy unlocked for group execution.
Speak to the twins again to register Flauros.
Unlocks Lockdown.
Next request: Phoenix with Counter.
WARNING: Re-summon Berith/Eligor if you need them for Hierophant/Emperor.
Pop a Persona into Lockdown for incense and Intensive Training trophy.
Travel to Kichijoji and trade Foreign Protein for Decorative Whip for Ann (equip it).
Speak to men in western alley in Kichijoji for Mementos target name.
Answers do not matter.

confidantAnswers.answer: I see a lot of things.

notes: Save your game.
Reload your save file.
If you didn't win, buy another ticket and wait another 7 days.

Automatic (This unlocks Shinjuku)
Make sure you have a Lovers persona on hand for the automatic class event with Ann tomorrow.
Automatic infiltration of Kaneshiro's Palace.

The teacher will throw a chalk at you and you have a 66% chance of successfully dodging it. If you do not dodge it, reload your save file. Make sure to dodge.

confidantAnswers.answer: Hey, as long as it tastes good.

notes: Take the twins to the Gym.
Harajuku date. Idol Poster Obtained.
Choose 'Respond later' to Ryuji's message.
Hang up your Idol Poster by interacting with the shelves in your room.
This unlocks Tsukishima.
Answers do not matter.
Pick up your Persona from Lockdown in Velvet Room if needed.
Fuse Phoenix with Counter (Yaksini + Genbu), then speak to twins to register Phoenix.
Next request: Setanta with Rakukaja. Make sure to register your Personas before itemizing or fusing, and re-summon any needed for Confidant rank ups.
